Description: String of seventeen beads: (a) thirteen small biconical sardonyx beads (one very worn and squater then the rest); (b) one larger barrel-shaped sardonyx bead (c) three blue-green glazed composition (faience) examples, one smaller than the others.
Excavator/field collector: Excavated by: Turner Bequest Excavations, Amathus
Bibliographic references: Murray, Smith and Walters 1900 / Excavations in Cyprus (p.117, Tomb 37)
